findings.details: Hover/active motion on blog/store/category cards now respects prefers-reduced-motion to reduce visual movement for sensitive users.
Network restricted; external link availability not verified. Manual scan for placeholder or http:// links in templates/pages/posts found none.
Pages include title/description/keywords and use jekyll-seo-tag with canonical/OG support.
Posts and listings retain consistent summaries and structured metadata across templates.

recommendations: Re-check external link availability when network access is available
Continue auditing interaction motion for reduced-motion compliance
